text.name: sys_description
text.text: The 32X is an extension for the Megadrive / Genesis designed to counteract the Jaguar's release. Plugged into the cartridge port, it adds 256 KB of RAM and the 32-bit processor at 23 Mhz multiplies its power by 40. The Megadrive finally has an improved palette of 32 thousand colors, a rendering of 50 thousand polygons second, 3D mapped and rotation / distortion / sprite zoom. As the Saturn's output is too close, only 34 games were released on the cartridge and 6 more on CD. It's a shame when you see pearls like Knuckles Chaotix, Kolibri and Virtua Racing.
